title: Objects detected using Object detection model are sorted using different ordering schemes
description: Object detected by the Object Detection model are sorted from left to right, top to bottom and also in terms of their size.

leftToRight.description: The objects are sorted from left to right in this section. The IDs of the object are presented starting with the left most object first

topToBottom.description: The objects are sorted from top to bottom in this section. The IDs of the object are presented starting with the top most object first

smallToBig.description: The objects are sorted in terms of their size from small to big. The IDs of the object are presented starting with the smallest object first
